name: Late Shift at Liminal Station
description:
Welcome to the Liminal Station Lost Property Office, your workplace over the summer holidays. Battle your pitiful lack of staff training to reunite the strange denizens of this extra-dimensional transit station with their lost items.

Made in 48 hours for GGJ 2021.

Narrative Design - Fergus Doyle

Development/music - Paulius Bieksa 

Development - Norgg

Art - Sinead Fielding (PixelStorm)
